item.title: Red path alleyway. Motorcycle's & E bike electric delivery drivers speeding down red path alleyway heading to eastway main road at high speed nearly knocking children over/small pet animals on leads/mums with buggies and children/pedestrians. This is a concern for parents and residents on the morning school run and pick up. Hackney council need to put staggered barriers in place to stop the high speed of e-bikes and motorcycles., 5th August
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Tree with disease overhanging and falling into property, 5th August
item.description:
Trees from allotmentments are overhanging our properties. These are too large to try and cut back ourselves. This tree directly over our garden has diseased leaves which are falling into our garden. This is a concern for us and our dogs health. Please help with managing this issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenscroft Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
